You will be redirected to BCA KlikPay once you tap \'Confirm Payment\' button.
For payment, you can choose to use KlikBCA Individual Account or BCA credit card.
For more information about BCA KlikPay please contact Halo BCA at (021) 1500888 or visit http://klikbca.com/KlikPay/klikpay.html.
4.\tChoose \'account number\' that you want to use for payment.
5.\tInput BCA Virtual Account Number and click \'OK\'.
6.\tBCA Virtual Account Number and your account information will appear on the payment confirmation page and then click \'Send\'.
8.\tEnter amount to be transferred then click \'OK\'.
On the main menu, choose \'Other transaction\'
Enter BNI virtual account number and press \'Correct\'
Enter the full amount to be paid and press \'Correct\'
Your payment details will appear on the confirmation page. If the information is correct press \'Correct\'
Choose \'Set Destination Account\' then \'Add Destination Account\'
Now Destination/Favorite account number is successfully added
Choose \'Transfer to BNI Account\' then choose destination/favorite account
Choose Debit Account and enter amount, then enter authentication token code
Login to BNI Mobile Banking application
Choose \'To BNI Account\' then \'Add New Account\'
Enter the full amount to be paid and press \'Proceed\'
Your payment details will appear on confirmation page.
If the information is correct then enter authentication token code and press \'Proceed\'
Please make sure that you have a User ID for BRI e-Pay and have registered for mTOKEN before going through with the payment
To obtain a User ID for BRI e-Pay, please register at the nearest BRI ATM.
Please visit the nearest BRI branch office to register the mTOKEN.
Payment via BRI e-Pay will be processed online and your BRI bank account balance will be deducted automatically based on your total amount.
Your transaction will be cancelled if payment is not completed within 2 hours.

After confirming your payment, we will issue you a unique Payment Code number.
Note down your Payment Code and total amount. Don\'t worry, we will also mail you a copy of the payment instructions.
Go to an Indomaret store near you and provide the cashier with the Payment Code number.
The cashier will then confirm the transaction by asking for the transaction amount and the merchant name.
Confirm the payment with the cashier.
Your transaction is successful! You should be receiving an email confirming your payment. Please keep your Indomaret payment receipt just in case you need help via support.
Input your registered indosat phone number.
Make sure you have sufficient funds in your account.
You will receive an USSD message from Indosat to complete transaction via Dompetku app.
IMPORTANT! After confirming your payment, you wont be able to change payment method
On the main menu, choose Other Transaction.
Enter 16 digits payment Account No. and press Correct.
Your payment details will appear on the confirmation page. If the information is correct press Correct.
On the main menu, choose Others.
Enter the full amount to be paid and press Correct.
Empty the transfer reference number and press Correct.
Your payment details will appear on the confirmation page. If the information is correct press Correct.
Please make sure that the UserID is active and registered at BCA.
Please continue the payment through KlikBCA by opening www.klikbca.com on a separate window or tab, using the same User ID that you entered below.
Transaction will be cancelled if payment is not completed within 2 hours.
On the main menu, choose Other Transaction.
Enter the full amount to be paid and press Correct.
Enter 16 digits payment Account No. and press Correct.
Your payment details will appear on the confirmation page. If the information is correct press Correct.
how can i pay with kioson payment ?
After confirming your payment, we will issue you a unique Payment Code number.
Note down your Payment Code and total amount. Don\'t worry, we will also mail you a copy of the payment instructions to your email.
Go to a Kioson outlet near you and provide the cashier with the Payment Code.
The cashier will open kioson Cash Point, on the menu chasier will select "Keagenan".
Enter your Payment Code and get the payment details.
Submit payment and print the receipt.
Your transaction is successful! You should be receiving an email confirming your payment. Please keep your payment receipt just in case you need help via support.
Please complete your payment at Kioson Outlet Before : %1$s
Please continue the payment process via KlikBCA by opening http://klikbca.com on your browser.
Please make sure that the UserID is active and registered at BCA.
Please continue the payment through KlikBCA by opening http://klikbca.com on your browser, using the same User ID that you entered above.
Transaction will be cancelled if payment is not completed within 2 hours.
We will securely save your card details so you can reuse them later.
how can i pay with mandiri bill payment ?
Make sure you have registered your mobile phone number for Mandiri e-cash.
Enter your phone number and PIN.
Please wait for an SMS from Mandiri e-cash that contains your One Time Password (OTP).
Enter the 6 digit OTP, then click \'pay\' to make payment.
If you haven\'t received the OTP or the OTP has expired, click \'cancel\' and retry your transaction.
